titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize dental insurance for veterans and survivors and dependents of veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5964-5965)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
6/23/2008--Introduced.
Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide a dental insurance plan for any veteran enrolled in the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) annual patient enrollment system, as well as their survivors and dependents. Provides for: (1) the payment of premiums for plan enrollment; and (2) voluntary plan disenrollment.
